PIUS the Bishop, Servant of the servants of God to his venerable brother Bishop of Glasgow, greeting and the apostolic benediction. Called, although with insuffi- cient merits, by divine dispensation to the highest dignity of the Apostolic See, we, on account of the duty of service under-taken by us, the more readily turn our anxious cares to those measures by which provision is made for the ad- vantage of hospitals and other pious places, as well as of poor and miser-able persons, and, that they may accomplish the desired end, we willingly inipart the apostolic favoiff when it is sought firom uS.
